Class ModuleService

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.service.ModuleService
@Service public class ModuleService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing course modules.

Provides functionalities such as adding, deleting, and updating course modules, as well as enforcing access controls based on user roles.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ModuleService

      public ModuleService()

  • Method Details

    • addModuleToCourse

      public void addModuleToCourse(User instructor, UUID courseId, ModuleDto moduleDto)
      Adds a new module to a specified course.

      Associates the provided ModuleDto with the course identified by courseId and saves the updated course.

      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor adding the module
      courseId - the unique identifier of the course to which the module will be added
      moduleDto - the data transfer object containing module details

    • deleteCourseModule

      public void deleteCourseModule(User instructor, UUID moduleId)
      Deletes a module from a specified course.

      Removes the module identified by moduleId from the course and saves the updated course.

      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor deleting the module
      moduleId - the unique identifier of the module to be deleted
      Throws:
      CourseModuleNotFoundException - if the module is not found within the course
      NotCourseInstructorException - if the user is not the instructor of the course

    • updateCourseModule

      public void updateCourseModule(User instructor, UUID moduleId, ModuleDto dto)
      Updates the details of a specified course module.

      Updates the module identified by moduleId with the provided ModuleDto and saves the updated course.

      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor updating the module
      moduleId - the unique identifier of the module to be updated
      dto - the data transfer object containing updated module details
      Throws:
      CourseModuleNotFoundException - if the module is not found within the course
      NotCourseInstructorException - if the user is not the instructor of the course

    • saveModule

      public void saveModule(CourseModule module)
      Saves a CourseModule entity to the repository.
      Parameters:
      module - the CourseModule entity to be saved

    • findModuleByIdAsInstructor

      public CourseModule findModuleByIdAsInstructor(User instructor, UUID moduleId)
      Retrieves a course module by its unique identifier, ensuring that the requesting instructor is authorized.
      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor requesting the module
      moduleId - the unique identifier of the module to retrieve
      Returns:
      the CourseModule entity corresponding to the provided ID
      Throws:
      CourseModuleNotFoundException - if the module is not found within the course
      NotCourseInstructorException - if the user is not the instructor of the course

    • findCourseModuleById

      public Object findCourseModuleById(User instructor, UUID moduleId)
      Retrieves a course module by its unique identifier and enforces access controls.
      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor requesting the module
      moduleId - the unique identifier of the module to retrieve
      Returns:
      the CourseModule entity or a StudentCourseModuleDto based on access permissions
